channel.title: CVE Feed for tpm2-software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tpm2-software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-29038|2024-06-28T14:26:47.695Z -- tpm2-software -- tpm2-tools
item.description: tpm2-tools is the source repository for the Trusted Platform Module (TPM2.0) tools. A malicious attacker can generate arbitrary quote data which is not detected by `tpm2 checkquote`. This issue was patched in version 5.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-29038|2024-06-28T13:44:07.035Z -- tpm2-software -- tpm2-tools
item.description: tpm2-tools is the source repository for the Trusted Platform Module (TPM2.0) tools. A malicious attacker can generate arbitrary quote data which is not detected by `tpm2 checkquote`. This issue was patched in version 5.7.
